links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: Multiplicative with a(p^e) = p^(min(e, 2)). - _David W. Wilson_, Aug 01 2001
prog: (Haskell)a007948 = last . filter ((== 1) . a212793) . a027750_row-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 27 2012, Jan 06 2012(PARI) a(n) = my(f=factor(n)); for (i=1, #f~, f[i,2] = min(f[i, 2], 2)); factorback(f); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jun 09 2014
author: R. Muller
